reviewText:
I must say that I love Stripes and Ghostbusters while Groundhog day isn't my favorite movie. I can still quote Stripes and some of Ghostbusters which greatly impressed my teenage son. These movies are super!!!!!! The team of Bill Murray & Harold Ramis is excellant. They really have a great chemistry whether it is acting together or whether Ramis is directing Murray. I highly reccomend these movies!!

Judi
Great Bill Murray collection.

Classics!

Maybe you think you've seen these great movies a dozen times, but if you saw them on commercial TV you missed some of the funniest parts.  Whether cut for timing or for a G rating, they've been hacked to mediocrity on TV.  Pay the few bucks, see it uncut. Laugh more.
If you love Bill Murray this a nice collection.
3 of the funniest movies of all time, what else can I say?
Bill Murray is great as usual.  I could do without the extended cut part though.
Can't go wrong with Bill Murray!
All discs worked and received on time.
I bought this combination because I like Groundhog Day a lot. Ghostbusters is also good. But Stripes is so old, and a very strong men's movie. My husband was not interested in it either.
Very good
All time favorite. I've purchased this set (at a good price) to watch with my family over Xmas.  My grandsons haven't seen all of these. It will be so much fun!
Funny  all of them really funny.  Classic
Love it!
Love these movies
Love these movies.
Who doesn't love these movies?

I literally watch these three movies every week. I don't have cable TV or basic cable or even internet at my house. So these movies help fill the void. Bill Murray is one of my favorite actors of all time, and he does not disappoint in these movies. I highly, highly recommend.

I just received the set of 3 dvds. The box was damaged and the cover on the Stripes DVD was cracked and punctured. It looks like there is no damage to the dvd. There should have been more packing material surrounding the boxed set.
Got this for my dad on father's day. He LOVED it! Shipped quickly and arrived safe. Many hours of laughs to be watched!

Bill Murray has had a great career. Recently he has been taking more serious parts. This is a great set with that said. Three of Bill Murray's best. Stripes is a classic and so funny. From the start of the movie you will be laughing hard. In that opening scene Bill Murray is a cab driver who gets this rich rude obnoxious customer who insults him throughout the ride. Bill Murray stops the car and stands up for himself in hilarious fashion throwing the car keys over the bridge. His plans now are to give the army a shot.
  Ghostbusters is one of his most famous roles and he does a great job here. GroundHog Day is one of his best movies ever. Stripes is the perfect movie to pop in after a stressful day at work to laugh. I strongly recommend this set. Cheers.
I saw these movies when they first came out.  Enjoy seeing how far movie-making has come since their production, these movies are highly entertaining.  Intelligent dialogue and humor!

Great seller and fantastic price.  Easy buy, thank you!  Oh and for the review piece of this blurb... if this is for you or a gift as long as they are a fan of older comedies and/or Bill Murray this is a must have :)

You've gotta love a movie that features Bill Murray, a groundhog, and time travel. The concept behind this movie has since become famous and widespread. This is still the best. Groundhog Day essentially teaches Murray's character a lesson in how to care about other people. However, before he learns it, he goes through several hilarious phases. At one point, he gets so sick of repeating Groundhog Day over and over that he tries increasingly creative ways to kill himself. He then tries to use the information he gets from repeating his days to help people out. All the while, Murray's sardonic humor carries the movie and makes it into a classic. Even if you've seen the copy cats, [ASIN:B001KEHAI0 Groundhog Day]] is still worth watching.

This set includes three of Bill Murray's best movies:

Stripes, a military film from 1981 with Harold Ramis and John Candy, was directed by Ivan Reitman and has a 6.8 rating from IMDb.

Ghost Busters from 1984 was also directed by Ivan Reitman and features Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis, who jointly wrote the imaginative script, and Sigourney Weaver. Ghost Busters currently carries a 7.8 rating from IMDb.

Groundhog Day, the best of the three, was released in 1993 and carries an 8.1 rating from IMDb, which also rates it as #160 on its list of the 250 best movies. Groundhog Day was directed by Harold Ramis, who also co-wrote the outstanding screenplay with Danny Rubin. Andie MacDowell is excellent as the foil for Murray in this film in which Murray plays a self-absorbed TV weatherman who seems to take forever to learn life's lessons after failing miserably, but in the end learning that the Earth does not revolve around him and that showing kindness to strangers is a winning strategy in the end. This is a film that I never tire of watching.
back when bill murray was funny not the serious actor meant for great roles he thinks he has become.
Bill Murray starring in three essential comedies.  All three are funny as can be and have laugh out loud moments through.  All at a great price.

This package set is a good idea and worth the purchase, however, be aware that you may receive a bad "Groundhog Day" disk. Several scenes freeze or have scanning problems, which seriously detract from viewing pleasure. Amazon probably is unaware of this difficulty, because I have never been disappointed with the company's products before. The other two movies were trouble-free.

I still can't believe I found this great 3 DVD box set at a store(wont tell name!) for only 4.99 + tax brand new and factory sealed!!! Such a great deal,the whole set cost me less than a single sale priced DVD!!! I bought it for Ghostbusters and Stripes(this DVD has BOTH original and extended cuts),but I liked Grounghog Day too after I watched it!!! Each DVD is loaded with great extras as well to boot,but if you own the original 1999 Ghostbusters Special Edition(now a collector's item!)DVD keep it,the version here has slightly different extras than that one(the Live commentary that was on the 1999 version is NOT here(only audio of the same commentary,this DVD is also the exact same one with the Ghostbusters 2-pack by the way just to let you know!),but it still has some great extras though,so it's only a minor qibble!!! Still a great set of comedy gems starring Bill Murray and more!!! A+
Bought this because we really enjoy Stripes and Groundhog day. Have not watched Ghostbusters yet.

We've seen 2 out of the 3 movies, and in each of them there are several sections where the audio is out of sync.  Groundhog Day is a good movie; Ghostbusters has not really held up over time (especially for my 13-year-old).
Bought it because my wife really wanted Groundhog Day but for the price, might as well get 3 movies.
great movies, total classics
This is a great boxset. The disc come in their own separate packaging. The picture quality is good.

3 classic movies from Bill Murray. Very Entertaining viewing, especially the classic Groundhog day. Stripes was humorous, Ghostbusters also a classic, but without doubt you cannot go past the cult classic, Groundhog Day
